=== Florida Team IRC ===

The Florida Team IRC channel is for members to get together and discuss current going ons with the team. 

Meetings are held every 1st & 3rd Sunday of the month at 8PM.

Make sure if there is something you wish discuss during a meeting you add it to the <nowiki>[[FloridaTeam-Meetings|meeting agenda]]</nowiki>

Minutes for the meetings can be found at <nowiki>[[FloridaTeam-Meetings-Minutes minutes page]]</nowiki>

Location of Channel: #ubuntu-us-fl on irc.ubuntu.com:6667 

Operators: <nowiki>[[DanTrevino|dantalizng]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[EldoVarghese|Poningru]]</nowiki>
